line.text: "To provide with fresh supplies, as of weapons and ammunition."
In SWORD, to make a flying agent go to a combat trains unit or to a supply point in order to get resources.
The agent moves to the closest supply point (or combat trains unit) inside its area of responsibility if he has one. Upon arrival, the agent will display a "Arrived on supply point" message.
The agent then starts the resupplying with respect to the current mission range (the agent will display a "Supplying" message). Once the supplying is over, a "Supplied" message is displayed.

italic.text: The agent moves to the closest supply point.
The agent has finished its supplying. No mission range was provided, so the agent has been fully resupplied.

line.text: If there is no curent mission range, then the agent uses the range of his previous mission instead. If the agent never had a mission with a range, then the agent resupplies fully all of its resources.
The fragmentary order ends once the resupply has finished.
